/* mngMemberUserMngMapper.UserDetail */
SELECT A.Seq AS seq ,A.Id AS id ,A.Type AS type ,A.Password AS password ,A.Name AS name ,A.Email AS email ,A.TelNo AS telNo ,A.RegistNo AS registNo ,A.Department AS department ,B.Name AS departmentName ,A.RepresentativeName AS representativeName ,A.GroupCode AS groupCode ,A.EnableYn AS enableYn ,A.UseYn AS useYn ,A.RegistUser AS registUser ,A.RegistDatetime AS registDatetime ,A.UpdateUser AS updateUser ,A.UpdateDatetime AS updateDatetime FROM CIS_User A LEFT OUTER JOIN CIS_UserAgencyDepartment B ON A.Department = B.Code WHERE A.Seq=#{seq}

/* mngMemberUserMngMapper.UserMngDetail */
SELECT A.Seq AS seq ,A.Id AS id ,A.Type AS type ,A.Password AS password ,A.Name AS name ,A.Email AS email ,A.TelNo AS telNo ,A.RegistNo AS registNo ,A.Department AS department ,B.Name AS departmentName ,A.RepresentativeName AS representativeName ,A.GroupCode AS groupCode ,A.EnableYn AS enableYn ,A.UseYn AS useYn ,A.RegistUser AS registUser ,A.RegistDatetime AS registDatetime ,A.UpdateUser AS updateUser ,A.UpdateDatetime AS updateDatetime FROM CIS_User A LEFT OUTER JOIN CIS_UserAgencyDepartment B ON A.Department = B.Code WHERE A.Seq=#{seq}

/* mngMemberUserMngMapper.UserAccessList */
SELECT a.id AS id ,a.groupcode AS groupCode ,Isnull(a.NAME, '') AS name ,Iif(a.type = 'd', '직조직', '파트너') AS typeName ,B.NAME AS departmentName ,Isnull(a.email, '') AS email FROM cis_user a LEFT OUTER JOIN cis_useragencydepartment b ON a.department = b.code WHERE a.useyn = 'Y' ORDER BY b.code, a.name

/* mngMemberUserMngMapper.UserGroupList */
SELECT A.AccessCategoryCode AS Code, C.AccessCategoryName AS Name, A.UseYn, A.RegistUser, A.RegistDatetime, A.UpdateUser, A.UpdateDatetime FROM CIS_AccessMaster A INNER JOIN CIS_USER B ON A.RegistUser = B.ID INNER JOIN CIS_AccessCategory C ON A.AccessCategoryCode = C.AccessCategoryCode LEFT OUTER JOIN CIS_UserAgencyDepartment D ON B.Department = D.Code WHERE A.AccessCategoryCode != '00000001' and A.AccessCategoryCode !='00000002' AND A.USEYN = 'y'

/* mngMemberUserMngMapper.UserAgencyDepartmentList */
SELECT Code, [Type], Name, UseYn, RegistUser, RegistDatetime, UpdateUser, UpdateDatetime FROM CIS_UserAgencyDepartment WHERE USEYN = 'y' AND TYPE='d'

/* mngMemberUserMngMapper.UserAgencyDepartmentList */
SELECT Code, [Type], Name, UseYn, RegistUser, RegistDatetime, UpdateUser, UpdateDatetime FROM CIS_UserAgencyDepartment WHERE USEYN = 'y' AND TYPE='p' ORDER BY Name
